Two games modes available, survival where you try to last as long as you can and Death Match where you compete with four other tanks to see who will win.

134490.name: Catwoman (GBC)
videogameversion: North American Game Boy Color edition
134490.description:
Back of the box

It might just be the purrrfect action game. As CATWOMAN, the best cat-burglar in the world, you'll move through tight spots and encounter challenging environments. Feline strength? Furtive movements? She'll have to rely on all her cat-like qualities to stay out of harm's way. An agile leap here, a lightning-fast flip there. She has all the right moves and this game has enough excitement to last a lifetime...make that NINE lifetimes!


Features characters from the popular comic series from DC Comics
Password stage access
A whole new kind of action game

134491.name: Catz
videogameversion: North American Game Boy Color edition
134491.description:
User Summary

Catz is a game that allows you to keep and take care of virtual pet cats. The longer that you play and take care of it, the more toys and breeds that will be unlocked and available to you.

134492.name: Championship Motocross 2001 Featuring Ricky Carmichael
videogameversion: North American Game Boy Color edition
134492.description:
User Summary

Motocross racing featuring 30 licensed riders and 16 bikes on over 20 tracks. Race on single tracks, practice tricks in freestyle, or go for the championship.

134493.name: Chase H.Q.: Secret Police
videogameversion: North American Game Boy Color edition
134493.description:
User Summary

When the dispatcher calls, it is up to you and your team to chase down the perpetrator. It isn't enough just to drive up to him, you must smash his car with your until it becomes an immobile piece of junk. Only then can you make your arrest.

134494.name: Checkmate (GBC)
videogameversion: North American Game Boy Color edition
134494.description:
User Summary

A chess game featuring 16 different opponents to play against, starting with the easiest opponent and getting more difficult as they are beaten.

134495.name: Runes of Shalak
134495.description:
User Summary

Collect coins to open the hidden portal which leads you to the next level. Avoid monsters and spikes for they will kill you. Very basic game.

134496.name: Chicken Run
videogameversion: North American Game Boy Color edition
134496.description:
In keeping with the film's story, the game takes place on a 1950s Yorkshire chicken farm and follows a group of lovable chickens as they try to break out of confinement.

Players must help Ginger and her flock make a break for freedom while avoiding the evil Mrs. Tweedy and her oafish husband, who wants to turn them into chicken pies.

When an American rooster named Rocky lands in the farm, Ginger sees her chance: these chickens won't cross the road - they'll fly the coop. Together, they prove that chickens are anything but chicken, as they engage in a daring and spectacular escape.

Source: Wikipedia, "Chicken Run (video game)", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

134497.name: Iron Age: Council of the Clans
134497.description:
In this tabletop political strategy game, players compete and co-operate with each other to create a community. Players gain honour by growing and managing their villages, and by interacting with other players. The more honour they gain, the better their position at the Landsmoot, a special democratic assembly where players vote for a Chieftain. Win the Landsmoot often enough, and you win the game as a whole.

Iron Age was originally developed by a professor of philosophy to teach political science to his students. From the "soft power" of culture, trade, and diplomacy, to the "hard power" of the army, nearly every facet of real world politics is reproduced in this game.

134498.name: Our Last Best Hope (Game Chef Entry)
134498.description:
From the introduction:

Our sun is dying. Mankind faces extinction. Sixteen months ago, I, Robert Capa, and a crew of seven, left earth frozen in a solar winter. Our mission: reignite the sun, before it's too late. Welcome to Icarus II. - Dr. Robert Capa, Sunshine

134499.name: Go!
134499.description:
User Summary

Head down the mountain on your trusty snowboard. Grab all the cookies you can and head through the giant rings. But bewared of the mines which will end your ride if you hit too many of them. Score as many points as you can.

134500.name: Cubix: Robots For Everyone – Race 'N Robots
videogameversion: North American Game Boy Color edition
134500.description:
User Summary

A racing game based off of the cartoon series Cubix: Robots For Everyone. Select from different robots to race as in this top-view racing game. Power-ups and speed boosts are available to help you win the race.
